message: “A study by Georgia Cares claims that more than 90 percent of Domestic Minor Sex Trafficking victims in Georgia were enrolled in school at the time of their exploitation.”

data.description: By Eliza Griffin Sex trafficking: the illegal business of recruiting, harboring, transporting, obtaining or providing a person and especially a minor for the purpose of sex. Atlanta — home to many things: the Falcons, Coca-Cola, CNN — and one of the biggest hubs of sex trafficking nationwide. Th...
data.title: Sex Trafficking In ATL: What You Don’t See Behind Closed Doors | 90.1 FM WABE
